resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

The purpose of this application is for people to participate in more good deeds. As we know, we aren\'t rewarded for some of the nicest things we do for other people and not everyone has infinite money to give. That\'s why this application is your reward. Our goal is that this will be a trusted app to show employers something they can\'t learn about you in the 30 minute interviews.
The search menu has not been implemented yet.
Thank you for taking time out of your day to reward someone who took time out of theirs to help you!
